sentence.Network_en: He reorganized Standard Brands twice a year, like clockwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年他必对标牌公司进行两次改组。

sentence.Network_en: She arrives every day at eight, as regular as clockwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 她每天八点钟到, 极有规律

sentence.Network_en: The Queen's holiday is arranged to go like clockwork, everything pre-planned to the minute.
sentence.Network_cn: 女王的假期安排得井井有条，所有活动都已提前把时间精确计划好了。

jx.jx_en_mean: With machinelike regularity and precision; perfectly
jx.jx_cn_mean: 精确地，有规律地：类似机器的规律和准确地；精确地

entry.def: A clockwork toy or device has machinery inside it which makes it move or operate when it is wound up with a key.

entry.tran: 很顺利地;准时地；很有规律地
entry.def: If you say that something happens like clockwork, you mean that it happens without any problems or delays, or happens regularly.

example.ex: The Queen's holiday is arranged to go like clockwork, everything pre-planned to the minute...
example.tran: 女王的假期安排得井井有条，所有活动都已提前把时间精确计划好了。

example.ex: He reorganized Standard Brands twice a year, like clockwork.
example.tran: 每年他必对标牌公司进行两次改组。

means.word_mean: 1. any mechanism of geared wheels that is driven by a coiled spring; resembles the works of a mechanical clock

sentences.en: After the clockwork of the watch was cleaned the watch kept perfect time.
sentences.cn: 那块表的发条装置擦干净后，走起来就非常精确了。

sentences.en: The sports day went like clockwork, with every race starting and finishing on time.
sentences.cn: 运动会进展顺利，所有赛事都准时开始，准时结束。
